response.overview: Tracing Bleeding Through's meteoric rise from playing obscure Orange County rock shows to joining the lineup at Ozzfest, The Warped Tour and The Headbanger's Ball Tour, this career-spanning documentary is more than meets the eye. In addition to performances of classic tracks such as "Love Lost in a Hail of Gunfire" and "Revenge I Seek," this innovative program also includes intimate interviews and behind-the-scenes access to all six band members.
response.title: Bleeding Through: Wolves Among Sheep
